name: Universal Credit
description: Monthly payment to help with living costs if you're on low income, out of work, or cannot work.

name: Child Benefit
description: Money paid to parents or guardians responsible for raising a child under 16 (or under 20 in approved education).

name: Pension Credit
description: Extra money to help with living costs if you're over State Pension age and on a low income.

name: Energy Bills Support Scheme
department: Department for Energy Security and Net Zero
description: Help for households with their energy bills during winter.

name: Disability Living Allowance (DLA)
description: Support for disabled children under 16 who need help looking after themselves or getting around.
